select

select
from article where title LIKE concat(concat('%',#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and deleted = 0

select
from article where deleted = 0 order by publish_time LIMIT #{begin, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{num, jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from article where deleted = 0 order by publish_time desc LIMIT #{num, jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.id, a.title, a.content, a.author, a.publish_time from article as a where a.id in ( select atr.article_id from article_tag_relationship as atr where atr.tag_id = ( select t.id from tag as t where t.name = #{tagName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) and a.deleted = 0
select count(*) as count, date_format(publish_time, "%Y-%m") as month from article where deleted = 0 group by date_format(publish_time, "%Y-%m")

select
from article where date_format(publish_time, "%Y-%m") = #{month, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and deleted = 0 order by publish_time
